name: Bodno Seaory S28 Dual Sided ID Card Printer & Complete Supplies Package ID Software and Camera - Silver Edition
short_description: ALL-INCLUSIVE PACKAGE & DUAL-SIDED PRINTING: Get everything you need to start printing professional-grade, dual-sided ID cards right out of the box, including the Seaory 17031 color ribbon (300 prints).

name: Easy Badges Solid 210 ID Badge Printer | with Beginner Software, & Everything Needed to Design and Print 400 ID Cards, | Single Sided Employee & Student ID Card Printer
short_description: Everything Included - The Solid 210 is a simple hand fed ID badge printer that makes single sided id badges. Your ID card printer comes with Cardholdir ID Beginner Software, QTY 2: 250 print full color ribbons, 400 PVC cards, to print and wear 400 standard CR80 sized (credit card sized) ID badges.
Print Quality - The Solid 210 is a Direct to Card printer. DTC printers print in 300 dpi, sufficient for 95% of organizations.

Easy to Use - This ID badge machine comes with Cardholdir ID badge creation software. Choose a template and go without the need for expensive graphic designers. Manual feeding, 300 full color cards/hour. Compatible with PC & Mac.

Best For - Cost effective security and small organizations. The Solid 210 ID Printer is the smallest in the industry. This smart little printer lightweight and compact to easily fit on any desk or office space.

Cardholdir ID Software- Cardholdir ID software is an easy-to-use, full-featured ID card software for use with your MAC or PC. Our software is a one time purchase with no reccurring charges. Easily create employee ID cards, access control cards, visitor passes and more. Easily drag and drop any standard image files into our software and start printing badges in only minutes.
